Step up and take control of how you leave your mark in the most immersive MLB® The Show™ yet. 

Discover new Road To The Show mechanics, deeper Franchise experiences, enhanced customization options, and true-to-life on-field action.

Road To The Show
NEW – Road to Cooperstown & Expanded Amateur Years Career
Your journey to greatness starts here, which path will you choose?
Earn a coveted spot at the MLB Draft Combine® or catch the eye of one of 11 additional new colleges as you advance through chapters of your career.
Compete in the officially licensed Men’s NCAA® College World Series® as you rise from a promising high school talent to one of the all-time MLB® greats – immortalized in the National Baseball Hall of Fame and maybe even a place on the first ballot.

Diamond Dynasty¹
Unmissable Updates
Build your ultimate fantasy team with a new Red Diamond rarity tier and World Baseball Classic player cards featuring elite game-changing players.
Play revamped Mini-Seasons campaigns as you level up your stars with an upgraded PXP system, customize their skills with Parallel Mods, and hit Parallel V faster through special challenges.

Franchise 
NEW – Revamped Front Office Experience
Play the nail-biting key matches and moments of your Franchise GM career with streamlined seasons and Custom Game Entry. Track rumours and strike big deals in the ultimate all-in-one Trade HUB, where a new Trade Logic System delivers real depth, immersion, and high-stakes decision-making. Smarter lineups and improved player regression now mirror the real decisions and realities that shape your organization’s future.

Storyline¹
The Negro Leagues Season 4
The award-winning game mode returns with all-new legends, uniforms, and stadiums – celebrating the stories of some of the most important yet often forgotten ballplayers in history.

Gameplay Updates – More Control Than Ever
Bear Down Pitching: exert total control over your pitches by earning a limited supply of elite focus to deploy in the most critical moments.

¹Internet connection required.

If you are interested in Early Access and playing 4 days early on March 13th 2026, do not purchase this version and instead purchase the Digital Deluxe Edition.
70010000099939.intro: Make your mark. Become a Legend. Own The Show™.
70010000099939.name: MLB® The Show™ 26

70010000111817.description:
“Without a doubt one of the best puzzle games I’ve ever played.”
IGN

“One of the very best puzzle games of the year, if not the decade.”
PC Gamer 

Opus Magnum: Complete Edition is the latest open-ended puzzle game from Zachtronics, the creators of SpaceChem, Infinifactory, TIS-100, and SHENZHEN I/O. Includes both Opus Magnum and the brand-new De Re Metallica expansion.

Master the intricate, physical machinery of the transmutation engine— the alchemical engineer’s most advanced tool— and use it to create vital remedies, precious gemstones, deadly weapons, and more.

Hailed as the most promising alchemist of his generation, Anataeus Vaya has just accepted a position as Head Alchemist of House Van Tassen, the oldest and richest of the city’s ancient Houses. But dangers lurk behind the family’s opulent facade, and alchemy alone may not solve every problem.


Design Machines - Design and build machines that carry out alchemical processes using a variety of components including programmable arms, customizable tracks, and more esoteric devices like Van Berlo’s wheel and the Glyph of Animismus.

Open-Ended Puzzles - Compete against your friends and the world to build the simplest, fastest, and most compact solutions to the game’s challenges. 

Rich Story - Intrigues and dark plots swirl around the city’s ancient Houses. Alchemists, who hold the power to create almost anything known to science, are highly sought— and highly dangerous.

Solitaire Minigame - Alchemical engineering takes focus and concentration. Take a break with Sigmar’s Garden, an original alchemy-based solitaire game. Every game is winnable, but not every game will be won…
De Re Metallica – An expansive prequel to Opus Magnum that includes 3 new glyphs, 17 new puzzles, and a new solitaire variant called “House Colvan.”
70010000111817.name: Opus Magnum: Complete Edition

70050000062653.description: This bonus content for MLB The Show 26 includes 15 The Show Packs, 2 World Baseball Classic Choice Packs, 1 Legend Choice Pack, 1 World Baseball Classic Uniform Choice Pack, Double Daily Rewards, 1 Cover Athlete Bat Skin Pack, and 20,000 Stubs™. Once acquired, items should be redeemed upon booting the game.
70050000062653.intro: Make your mark. Become a Legend. Own The Show™.
70050000062653.name: Digital Deluxe Edition Bonus Content

70010000095062.description: Northern Bear is crawling with penguins! The Emperor Penguin is moving his minions north of the arctic circle, and it’s up to Walnut the Walrus and Noklas the Narwhal to freeze them in their tracks! Use Walnut’s Walrus Wind to freeze penguins into ice-blocks. Use the ice-blocks to build new paths, stairs, and bridges! This simple concept is the foundation of a whole adventure of puzzling predicaments.
70010000095062.name: Let's Freeze Some Penguins

70010000112212.description:
DigDigDrill is a mining, ore-collecting, and drill-customization simulation game where you carve out the underground world step-by-step at your own pace.

Dig, collect, and grow stronger. This is the definitive edition of "steady progress" mining that you won't be able to put down!
Use the resources you gather to create your very own original drill.
Let's dig deep into a cozy world with no enemies and no time limits!

<<< DigDigDrill Features >>>
- Mindless fun with mining and treasure hunting
- Block-puzzle style forging to enhance your drill just the way you like it
- Equipment with various special effects for efficient digging
- Extra stages appear after clearing the game for even more fun!

◆ Steady Digging
Dig through the earth and collect ores and treasure chests. Your goal: Floor 999!
Once your bag is full, head back to the surface to drop off your haul.

◆ Puzzle x Forging
Craft new drills using the ores you've collected.
If you fit the ores into the blueprints just right, you might create the ultimate drill.

◆ Choose Your Gear
If you're lucky, your drill will gain special effects. Combine them wisely to boost your efficiency!
- Specialize in movement speed to transport resources to the surface quickly
- Power up your bombs to blast through large areas at once
The choice is yours!

◆ End-Game Content
High-difficulty stages await you after the main clear.
The treasures you'll find there are just as powerful!

<<< Recommended for people who: >>>
- Want to lose themselves in satisfying "grind" tasks
- Love grinning at a massive collection of items
- Enjoy theory-crafting builds in hack-and-slash games
- Are looking for a relaxing game to unwind
70010000112212.intro:
Dig, Build, and Grow Stronger
Relaxing ground mining and ore collection
Aim for B999 and beyond with your custom drill!
70010000112212.name: DigDigDrill

70010000096720.description: You run your own perfume store as the owner of a perfume store. A sudden accident has involved you in the investigation of your own resurrection from the dead. The truth gradually emerges  with three employees - a love affair about perfume.  Harvest the memories of your own heartbeat in the game!
70010000096720.intro: “Aroma Love Ready!” is a whimsical fantasy rom-com! Enjoy sweet romance wrapped in lighthearted comedy!
70010000096720.name: Aroma Love Ready!

70010000117659.description:
Shuri, the people of the sky, became a messenger of the golden dragon of the king of the sky and headed for HestiaFort.

In HestiaFort, there is a Red Bird.

Together with Shuri, run through HestiaFort to meet the Red Bird.

In this game, you will avoid the red ball and aim for the blue circle.

Run and fly through stages to reach the goal.
70010000117659.intro: At the end of the blue sky that spreads out like the sea, HestiaFort
70010000117659.name: HestiaFort

70010000074146.description:
The year is 12,012. Multiquadrillionaire monopoly "GSSAI CO." has been in power of the universe for centuries after a world-ending bioweapon was unleashed onto the masses. And now? The solar system has been destroyed by unknown celestial forces. A weapons development program run by the Earth subsidiary of "GSSAI CO." is fast progressing. And the world's denizens are disappearing.

That is until one man screws up a game of pool.

HERO OF THE STARS AND THE SKY
● Use your tongue to lick enemies and objects as you make your way through open metroidvania-like areas, whilst collecting "Planet Bits" to help fix the solar system!

WELCOME TO RUBATO WORLD
● 5 compact, densely packed areas ranging from a huge sprawling bakery to the world's most poorly planned city. Uncover secrets and shortcuts in every corner of the world.

IF I COULD ONLY LOVE
● A strange, funny plot with a deep focus on humour and character writing. It gets silly. It gets serious. Really concerningly serious. Uh. Is the guy who made this game okay..?

BUT FIRST, LOVE YOURSELF
● To save the world, you must save yourself first. Find yourself again.
70010000074146.intro: RUBATO, an experimental, 2D physics-based take on the collect-a-thon genre!
70010000074146.name: RUBATO

70010000099823.description:
On a bold and potentially dangerous mission to revive the classic Arcade military shooter. Fully loaded with addictive top-down and side-scrolling run-and-gun gameplay, pixel-perfect 2D graphics, explosive SID soundtrack and massive destruction! Fight on foot and in heavily armed vehicles.

Do you miss the days of the Arcade military shooter? Single-handedly blasting your way through entire armies of enemy soldiers, rescuing good guys, and blowing lots of stuff up!!

Relying on just your reactions, your fast trigger finger and a limited grenade supply. Do you pine for the golden age of run-and-gun shooters?

If the answer is yes, Machine Gun Fury is here!
70010000099823.intro: Dive into a bold arcade-inspired shooter with explosive 2D action!
70010000099823.name: Machine Gun Fury

70010000106444.description:
Command An Army Of Ghosts  
Summon and control a legion of ghosts, banshees, gremlins, and more, each with unique abilities. Your ghoulish goons are more terrifying (and entertaining) than ever.  
 
Strategy Meets Supernatural  
Blend tactics, adventure, and resource management in a seamless gameplay loop set within a richly built paranormal world. 
 
Solve Mysteries, Unleash Horror 
Every haunting is a puzzle. Use spectral strategy and powers to uncover secrets, manipulate mortals, and complete objectives.  
 
Rediscover the Fear  
Ghost Master: Resurrection invites you to master the art of fear in a beautifully reimagined supernatural playground. The dead have risen... and they're under your control.
70010000106444.name: Ghost Master: Resurrection

70010000116617.description: Spy Guy is a brilliant detective who travels around the world looking for hidden clues. This time, he needs your help to find identical pairs! Can you help him?
70010000116617.intro: Can you find two identical hidden objects?
70010000116617.name: Spot the Spy Guy

70010000119666.description:
Build your legacy from the ground up! In Castle Factory Tycoon, you aren’t just a king—you’re an industrial mastermind. Transform a small plot of land into a sprawling, impenetrable fortress by mastering the art of the forge.

Forge. Sell. Expand.
Start your journey by purchasing your first Droppers. Watch as they churn out essential gear for the realm. From sturdy axes and shields to mystical glowing potions, every item created is gold in your pocket.

Massive Construction.
With over 160 unique upgrades and items to buy, your castle will never stop growing. You can even upgrade your upgraders!


Features:
>Rebirth System: Reached the top? Reset your progress to earn permanent money multipliers! Every rebirth makes your next empire grow faster and bigger.

>Auto-Save & Load: Your progress is safe with us. Build at your own pace—your kingdom will be waiting exactly where you left it.

>Stunning Visuals: Watch your empty lot evolve into a bustling medieval powerhouse.


Are you ready to claim your crown?
70010000119666.name: Castle Tycoon Simulator

70070000033110.description:
Terrorise the unsuspecting citizens of Gravenville across 11 fully reimagined locations, from eerie asylums and military compounds to chaotic frat houses and heavily guarded police stations. All included Core Edition. The Core Edition also features two brand-new DLCs included with the base game!

Command An Army Of Ghosts  
Summon and control a legion of ghosts, banshees, gremlins, and more, each with unique abilities. Your ghoulish goons are more terrifying (and entertaining) than ever.  
 
Strategy Meets Supernatural  
Blend tactics, adventure, and resource management in a seamless gameplay loop set within a richly built paranormal world. 
 
Solve Mysteries, Unleash Horror 
Every haunting is a puzzle. Use spectral strategy and powers to uncover secrets, manipulate mortals, and complete objectives.  
 
Rediscover the Fear  
Ghost Master: Resurrection invites you to master the art of fear in a beautifully reimagined supernatural playground. The dead have risen... and they're under your control.
70070000033110.name: Ghost Master: Resurrection Core Edition

70010000117414.description:
Enter Mistfall Ruins, an enchanted forest where ancient stone structures rise through drifting mist.

Wander through glowing woods, winding paths, and forgotten clearings as you explore the glorious Ruins of Mistfall. Each ruin tells a story of a lost age, hidden deep within the forest. Discover different regions, uncover secrets, and seek out every ruin scattered across the land.

Mistfall Ruins is all about exploration, atmosphere, and wonder — rewarding curiosity and careful discovery.

Features:
>Enchanted forest environment
>Majestic ancient ruins to discover
>Multiple areas to explore
>Calm, atmospheric exploration gameplay
>Hidden scenic locations
70010000117414.intro: Follow the mist. Discover the forgotten.
70010000117414.name: Mistfall Ruins

70010000102199.description:
Work with your neighbours and the city council to improve your local community while you settle in to city life. Welcome to Garland, you're gonna love it here!**
**Loving it not guaranteed.
70010000102199.intro:
Move to a new* apartment in the bustling city of Garland! Make friends, find work, and decorate your new home.
*Apartment quality may vary...
70010000102199.name: Moonlight in Garland

70010000106909.description:
About Ariana and the Elder Codex
The Librarian Ariana's mission is to repair the Seven Hero Codices, which have been altered. Due to the terrible damages, magic has vanished from the world.

By utilizing special Librarian magic that allows her to enter Codices, Ariana seeks to mend the books to bring back magic. Can Ariana safely repair each tome and unravel the mysteries hidden within the Library?

Key Features
Restore the books, reclaim the magic — Venture into the Seven Hero Codices as Ariana, defeating enemies to earn new magic spells and abilities that grant access to previously unreachable areas. Restore Repair Points by taking on platforming and combat challenges that put your abilities to the test. Clear Repair Points as quickly as possible for permanent HP boosts and more!

Librarian Magic materializes — With 30+ unlockable magic spells and abilities, mix and match them across six slots as you embark on your journey to repair the altered Codices. Experiment with different combinations to discover what best suits your playstyle.

Clash with the guardians of the altered Codices — Face formidable bosses, each with a devastating arsenal that will test your combat and platforming skills. Dodge spells, time your attacks, and stay on top of your health to prevail.

Harness the power of Magic Items — Mitigate challenges by unlocking, crafting, and equipping Magic Items to boost stats and gain buffs such as elemental boosts, increased critical hits, reduced knockback, and more!
70010000106909.intro: Restore the Codices and unravel the Library's hidden truths...
70010000106909.name: Ariana and the Elder Codex

70010000107020.description: Take hold of your own personal grimoire with this 62-page Digital Art Book, which includes character art, designer notes, a timeline, and more!
70010000107020.name: Ariana and the Elder Codex Digital Art Book

70010000107112.description:
Get enchanted with the music of Ariana and the Elder Codex in this 18-track Digital Soundtrack!

Tracklist:
・Runes and Reverence
・Archivum Incantationum
・Hidden Path
・Echo in the Silence
・Via Perdita in Silva
・Mist and Flame
・Disenchanted Age
・Frostbound Fade
・Flamma Absentia
・Lux Materna
・Quiet Sanctuary
・Vicus Arx Obscura
・Interludium
・Deadlock
・Stalemate
・Prelude to the Storm
・Storm Breaks
・Ariana
70010000107112.name: Ariana and the Elder Codex Digital Soundtrack

70010000115950.description:
Within these walls, your fate rests in the hands of luck. Overpowered 2 - Crux of Fate is a survival shooter where you’ll have to surround yourself with the most powerful weapons you can find in order to fend off relentless waves of enemy monsters! But as you will soon discover, in this arena your luck increases with each failed attempt, and your determination will ultimately be rewarded!

Enter a dark arena where everything is out to kill you. The action ensues in top-down retro pixel art style where you control a lone human combatant, strategically navigating in every direction and around columns to keep incoming enemy hordes at a safe distance, but still within striking range. Start by selecting a single weapon, then pick up experience drops to level up and improve gear or choose additional armaments. Collect hearts to recover health, gain temporary speed boosts and more! How long can you hang on?

• Run from enemy hordes while keeping them within range of your selected weaponry!
• Pick up experience boosts from fallen foes and level up on the fly.
• Add new weapons to your growing arsenal, each with unique attacks and effects!
• Focus on strategic movement while your weapons automatically strike nearby enemy monsters.
• Survive 20 menacing waves and escape the arena.
• Increase your luck with each failed attempt, gradually creeping towards your goal with determination!
70010000115950.intro: Press your luck to its absolute limits as you fight for survival in a deadly monster arena!
70010000115950.name: Overpowered 2 - Crux of Fate

70050000068169.description:
Conjure the power of the rain with the Rainfall Ring*—an equippable Magic Item that increases your max HP.

*The Rainfall Ring is exclusive DLC for the Deluxe Edition.
70050000068169.name: Ariana and the Elder Codex: Rainfall Ring

70050000068170.description:
Bless your journey with Mothers' Blessing*—an equippable Magic Item that increases the healing amount of recovery magic by 15%.

*Mothers' Blessing is exclusive DLC for the Deluxe Edition.
70050000068170.name: Ariana and the Elder Codex: Mothers' Blessing

70050000068171.description:
Start your mission to repair the Seven Hero Codices on the right page with the Ocean Bookmark*—an equippable Magic Item that reduces cooldown time after using magic by 20%!

*The Ocean Bookmark will only be available as FREE DLC for the first two weeks after the game's launch for purchasers of the Digital Standard Edition or Deluxe Edition.
70050000068171.name: Ariana and the Elder Codex: Ocean Bookmark

70070000033425.description:
Unravel the mysteries hidden within the Library with the Ariana and the Elder Codex Deluxe Bundle!

The Deluxe Bundle includes:
• Digital game
• Digital Art Book (62 pages)
• Digital Soundtrack (18 tracks)
• Ocean Bookmark*
• Rainfall Ring**
• Mothers' Blessing**

*The Ocean Bookmark will only be available as FREE DLC for the first two weeks after the game's launch to purchasers of the Digital Standard Edition or Deluxe Edition.

**The Rainfall Ring and Mothers' Blessing are exclusive DLC for the Deluxe Edition.
70070000033425.name: Ariana and the Elder Codex Deluxe Bundle

70010000110528.description:
An exciting new style of action adventure fusing shooting action with exploration.

■A new take on shooting action and in-depth exploration
Experience a new type of action adventure, featuring a fusion between exploration within an expansive world and highly technical twin-stick shooting. At your home base, power up the demon king Damon and make purchases. During the exploration phase, defeat enemies to complete each area. The story progresses as you alternate between the two phases.

■Strategic battles with a vast arsenal of weapons and gimmicks
The battle mechanics include both close-ranged attacks with handguns as well as long-ranged attacks with machine guns and more.
You can find more powerful weapons as you explore. 
During the boss battles awaiting within each stage, a strategic approach making use of the area gimmicks will prove crucial.

■Customization and Outfit Changes
Damon grows throughout the adventure, learning to master various weapons and skills. You can customize your set of skills to match your play style. You can even choose from a variety of outfit options to change Damon's appearance.

■Journey together with two player co-op
Take control of Damon's canine companion to help him in combat in various ways, such as collecting items.
*Only available via local (offline) play
70010000110528.intro: An unlikely pair, an unforgettable journey
70010000110528.name: DAMON and BABY

70050000069070.description: Digital content pack that includes the digital soundtrack and digital artworks for DAMON and BABY.
70050000069070.name: DAMON and BABY Deluxe Contents

70070000033436.description:
■Deluxe Edition Contents
- Main game
- Digital Artworks & Digital Soundtrack

"DAMON and BABY" is also available in the standard edition. Please be careful not to purchase more than one copy.
"Digital Artworks & Digital Soundtrack" is separate applications from the main game.

*Only available via local (offline) play
70070000033436.intro: An unlikely pair, an unforgettable journey
70070000033436.name: DAMON and BABY Deluxe Edition

70010000076952.description:
A heroine who has lost everything faces tragedy and discovers her way of life in a magical and suspense-filled Otome game.

[Main Cast]
Olivier Paquet (CV: Okitsu Kazuyuki)
Emmanuel de Beaumont (CV: Umehara Yuuichirou)
Melodie (CV: Suzuki Tatsuhisa)
Ismail (CV: Yamoto Souma)

[Story]
It is an era shrouded in darkness — the world sealed off, and a deadly plague ravaging the land. A peaceful village is ruthlessly attacked by a knightly order, leaving your home in ruins and your family slain.

Saved by a mysterious figure, you are led to a magical city floating upon the sea. There, the stranger proclaims you to be the Moon Witch, destined to guide the people toward prosperity. But amidst your newfound safety and status, turmoil begins to brew. Friends turn on one another, alliances falter, and blades begin to clash.

You wish to end this tragedy. To take root in this land and live on. Who will you trust...? Who will you choose to face the end with?
70010000076952.name: Volontés

70010000087314.description:
Break blocks, grab powerups, solve puzzles, and beat bosses! When a mysterious tower appears in the forest, Chico the Chipmunk and his new friend Beeatrice decide to go exploring. In the tower they'll find a whole host of block-breaking challenges, clever environmental puzzles, and secrets to be unraveled! How can a tower appear out of nowhere? The answers are waiting inside.

In the block breaking Rebound challenges, you'll be tasked with clearing every block from the stage by bouncing around Chico's trusty giant walnut. Keep a long volley going to get a high score! Chico can change the angle of the ball by tail-whipping it while he runs, to give you control over your shot. It's simple to start but takes skill to master!

Of course, it's not always so simple. There are over a dozen types of blocks, and different power-ups for the walnut that change how they interact. Fire power burns grass blocks, spikes smash through blocks with ease, explosive power breaks stone, and much much more! Fans, cannons, ghosts, and more turn each level into a unique challenge! It's block-breaking like you've never experienced it before.

In between block breaking challenges you'll explore the mysterious Celestial Tower, a large interconnected dungeon full of environmental puzzles! Explore all 6 floors of the tower, unlock new paths, and make your way to the very top! You'll meet a cast of characters who need your help, as they try to complete their secret mission. Can you solve the puzzles, uncover the truth of the Celestial Tower, and save the day?

Have fun and show off your unique style! Save up the sunflower seeds you collect, and you can trade them in for special designs for both your walnut and the game's interface! Why not bounce around a watermelon or a paper lantern instead of a walnut? There are a bunch of colors and styles to choose from.
70010000087314.intro: Master skill-based block breaking challenges, solve environmental puzzles, and explore the mysterious tower with Chico the Chipmunk!
70010000087314.name: Chico's Rebound

70010000097679.description:
Home to magical creatures and plants, the fabled Grimoire Groves should’ve been a haven for witches looking for a new home. But by the time they arrive, the forest spirits have disappeared and only a few plant creatures remain. But not all is lost. With a little hard work, investigation and magic, the witches might just restore the Grimoire Groves to the lush forest it once was!

Master Witch Magic
Unlock and learn new spells to complete your grimoire. Mix and match different spells to find your own brand of magic and master the balance between all four elements. 

Grow, Forage and Craft
Discover all that the groves have to offer! Collect fruits, craft new spells and items and grow plant creatures to repopulate the forest. Honor the witch tradition of foraging and learn to enhance your powers.

Befriend Mythical Creatures
Find the fabled forest spirits and give them a new home. Help them restore the balance of the groves by boosting their magical powers, as well as your own, with decorations around your cottage. 

Unravel the Mystery of the Rainbow Socks
Embark on a journey to recover the most mythical item to ever exist – the fabled Rainbow Socks – as you investigate what disturbed the careful balance of the magical forest.
70010000097679.intro: Join the witches in their quest to restore the Grimoire Groves! Master magic, grow cute plant creatures and discover the mystery of the Rainbow Socks.
70010000097679.name: Grimoire Groves

70010000100668.description:
In this hybrid strategy roguelite deck builder, you must protect your hero from hordes of enemies in a grid-based combat system. Prepare to fend off attacks from all directions as you remain stationary at the centre of the battlefield. Use your action cards wisely, strategically combining energy, cards, effects, and knowledge of your enemies to overcome the odds.

Stand Your Ground
What do you get when an unstoppable force meets an unmovable object? Chaos, and lots of it. With 100+ different cards, items and weapons with unique effect combinations, you’ll craft the ultimate stalwart against the forces of corruption. Build deck synergies and choose key skills upgrades as you set out to save the world. 

Dust Yourself Off
Decide your character’s journey. Trade with merchants, be faced with moral decisions along the way, and shape your hero’s adventure. Unlock unique hero backgrounds that alter your starting deck and can impact the strategy of your run each time you play. 

Brave A New World
The world, divided into eight elemental regions, will permanently react to the multitude of choices you make. Each time you play, experience completely unique runs within an overarching story, with over 100 enemies, 9 bosses, different starting decks and 25 arenas to discover.
70010000100668.intro: Journey to the Void places you at the edge of a corrupted world. It’s up to you to venture toward the centre and uncover the mystery at the heart of it all.
70010000100668.name: Journey to the Void

70010000103570.description:
This is a deck-building roguelike game. Combine and upgrade over 100 carefully designed spells to forge the ultimate magical power.

More than 50 unique enemies appear across a wide variety of stages. Choose your own battle strategy and cast powerful spells at just the right moment to fend off endless waves of foes!

Encounter unexpected events, decide between risky or safer paths, face different enemies, pick different cards, and discover powerful relics!
70010000103570.intro: Build your deck and unleash the most powerful spells.
70010000103570.name: Legendary Spell

70010000106778.description:
Primal Planet is a solo developed metroidvania that combines survival and crafting elements with a pixel-perfect aesthetic and an action-packed story, and it's all taking place on a lush planet filled with dinosaurs.

Uncover the Story
Embark on a thrilling journey as you follow the gripping tale of a cave dweller fighting to protect his family. Survive a brutal T-Rex attack and uncover a narrative blending the wild with intriguing sci-fi twists. Forge unexpected alliances as you unravel the truth behind an alien presence.

Adapt and Survive
Survival in the wilderness demands cunning. Use natural resources to craft vital tools, weapons, and mixtures for healing and protection. Gain experience and upgrade your skills to overcome the countless dangers of a primal planet.

Explore the Primeval
Discover diverse biomes, each with unique challenges and secrets. Traverse dense forests, sprawling plains, treacherous mountains, and mysterious ocean depths where danger awaits. Encounter a vast array of dinosaurs, from the majestic Apatosaurus to the terrifying Carnotaurus, each perfectly adapted to its habitat.

Fight and Be Clever
Experience gameplay blending combat and strategy. Adapt to face ancient beasts and aliens alike. Tailor tactics, use crafted weapons, bait, traps, and stealth to master encounters with regular and boss enemies. Every confrontation tests your skill and cunning.

Play Local Co-op
Team up with a friend in local co-op where player 2 can jump in at any time as Sino the nimble sinosauropteryx, your faithful companion. Work together to overcome obstacles, solve puzzles, and battle foes as your bond strengthens, skills increase and Sino grows up to become a fierce and loyal friend.

In Primal Planet, your journey from a humble cave dweller to the planet's last hope is filled with danger, wonder, and the unbreakable bonds of family. Are you ready to rise to the challenge?
70010000106778.intro: Unveil a heartfelt story of family, dinosaurs, and UFOs! Craft, upgrade, and survive in a realm of primeval predators, alone or in co-op. Welcome to the Dinovania!
70010000106778.name: Primal Planet

70010000110284.description: Journey back to Neopia with 26 classic games, brought back to life for new and returning fans!
70010000110284.name: Neopets - Mega Mini Games Collection - The Neopian Arcade Odyssey

70010000111054.description:
Welcome to Kayu, where every citizen, both man and woman, young and old alike, enjoy martial arts.

Living in that kingdom as a Daoist priestess in training, you made your way to the Tournament of Valor to root for your childhood friend.

A sudden attack during the Tournament of Valor forces you to protect your country and those you care about.

Fight alongside friend and foe alike to save your kingdom!
70010000111054.name: Otome Daoshi -Fighting For Love-

70010000112629.description:
Embark on an epic adventure in Aarik And The Ruined Kingdom, a relaxing and family-friendly perspective puzzle game that blends heart warming storytelling with mind-bending challenges. 

Join Aarik as he journeys through enchanted castles, mystical forests, vast deserts, eerie swamps, and frozen tundra, all while solving intricate puzzles to reunite his family. 

Harness the power of your father’s magical crown, equipped with four enchanted gemstones, to reshape the world around you. Fix crumbling bridges, mend broken paths, make new allies, and even reverse time itself! Dive into a world full of unique levels and devious puzzles in this captivating quest to find Aarik’s mother and restore hope to a broken land.
70010000112629.intro: Use the King's magic crown to solve perspective puzzles and fix a broken kingdom.
70010000112629.name: Aarik And The Ruined Kingdom

70010000115567.description:
Turn classic Mario side-scrolling gameplay on its head with the addition of Wonder Flowers. These game-changing items trigger spectacular moments you have to see to believe. Witness singing and dancing piranha plants, turn into a Goomba, and more in these unexpected events called Wonder effects.

Set out on an adventure to save the Flower Kingdom from Bowser and take on Bowser Jr. and all seven Koopalings in boss battles through the various worlds. Choose from a cast of characters including Mario, Luigi, Peach, Daisy, and more—this Nintendo Switch™ 2 Edition  also features Rosalina and Co-Star Luma. Grab surprising power-ups, like the trunk-trouncing Elephant Fruit and the flower-hopping Super Flower Pot, to help you along the way. You can also enable Assist Mode to become immune to damage, and recover from falls with the Propeller Flower, if you’re having trouble—regardless of which character you are playing as!

Meet up with friends for attractions and entertainment in Bellabel Park

Captain Toad has discovered Bellabel Park in the Flower Kingdom! Explore this area with your friends in local*, online**, or local wireless* multiplayer in the Nintendo Switch 2 Edition. Visit the attractions to cooperate or compete using a variety of game mechanics. 

Share the wonder with friends and Mario fans near and far

Gather up to four people around one system* to experience the game-bending Wonder effects together as you tackle courses as a team and help each other on your way to the Goal Pole. Online**, you can work together or turn a course into a friendly race to finish first. Even when playing solo, connecting online lets you see live player shadows of up to 11 other Mario fans around the world as they embark on their own journeys. See how they approach each course and get their help when you’re in trouble. Find standees left by other players to help recover from falls—or place your own.

You can also play the Nintendo Switch 2 Edition with friends who don’t have the game, in person or online, via GameShare***.

Already have Super Mario Bros.™ Wonder for Nintendo Switch? Purchase the upgrade pack!

If you already have the game for Nintendo Switch, you can purchase the upgrade pack**** separately to enjoy all the additional content and improvements of the Nintendo Switch 2 Edition!

Unlock and equip badges with various effects

Want some more midair time? Equip the Parachute Cap. Want an extra boost underwater? Dolphin Kick is your best bet. Having trouble perfecting your platforming? Safety Bounce will save you from a fall. Using your badges together with power-ups is the key to saving the Flower Kingdom!
70010000115567.intro: Save the Flower Kingdom in the latest side-scrolling Super Mario adventure—now with more content and improvements for the Nintendo Switch™ 2 system
70010000115567.name: Super Mario Bros.™ Wonder – Nintendo Switch™ 2 Edition + Meetup in Bellabel Park

70010000116176.description:
Cards Lie is a single-player social deduction experience inspired by timeless games of bluff and betrayal — reimagined in a gothic, Burton-esque world. Each card represents a villager or a demon. Flip, listen, and judge who tells the truth… or who’s leading you straight to hell.

Features

• • 75 beautifully hand made illustrated cards — villagers, demons, and mysterious clues.


• • Procedural scenarios — no two rituals are the same.

• • Lies that evolve — demons adapt their deceit every round.

• • Stylized art direction — gothic charm inspired by Tim Burton and medieval engravings.

• • Atmospheric soundtrack — haunting choirs and dark ambient tones.

• • Easy to learn, hard to master — uncover patterns, analyze logic, and trust your instincts.



Gameplay Loop

1. → Gather your village.

2. → Flip a card and reveal a phrase — truth or lie.

3. → Use logic and intuition to eliminate the demons.

4. → One mistake… and the village falls to darkness.

“Not every smile is innocent.”

Will you see through the lies?
70010000116176.intro: Unmask the demons. Trust no one. You’ve gathered the entire village for a midnight ritual. Among them hide creatures of pure evil — demons disguised as villagers.
70010000116176.name: Cards lie

70010000117609.description:
"99% sweetness × 1% surprise"!?
"Hey, do you know the meaning of the four-leaf clover?"
A fully-voiced, youthful yuri visual novel you'll fall in love with at first sight is coming to Nintendo Switch™!

【Synopsis】
The wheels of fate begin to turn.
The girls meet, fall in love, and deepen their bonds.
"Hey, do you know the meaning of the four-leaf clover?"
Set at "Shonan Saika Academy," a prestigious school in Shonan, Kanagawa Prefecture, this is a youthful story of girls wavering between friendship and love.
Shonan Saika Academy, a high-achieving all-girls school in Kanagawa Prefecture.

One day, Marin Tachibana, along with her best friends Mashiro Saotome and Kiyoka Jinguji, experiences a special day.
It begins with meeting an unusual new transfer student, Shizuku Kujyo.
A beautiful girl with a calm and dignified demeanor.
Meeting her feels like déjà vu...
While showing her around the school, they stop by an observation deck, where Marin finds a four-leaf clover.
There is a tradition at this school:
If you press a four-leaf clover found on the observation deck into your student notebook, your wish will come true.
(I want to get closer to her. To spend more time with her...)
With this wish, Marin gives Shizuku the "coincidental" four-leaf clover she found.
This act becomes a turning point, bringing Marin and Shizuku closer together with the help of Mashiro and Kiyoka. However...
"Please, stop worrying about me. I don't want to just be protected..."
"Shizuku, we're friends, right?"
A storm threatens to tear them apart.
It is deeply tied to a "secret" Shizuku is hiding and a "trauma" from Marin's past.
The story follows the growth, mutual support, and cherished memories of the four girls.
Will Marin and the others find their personal "clover" (happiness)?

【Localization】
In addition to Japanese, supports English and Chinese (Traditional and Simplified)!

【Main Character】
Gentle and healing girl-----Marin Tachibana (立花 茉鈴)
CV: Saho Shirasuna

Cool and beautiful girl-----Shizuku Kujyo (九条 しずく)
CV: Yuki Takada

Bright and cheerful mood-maker-----Mashiro Saotome (早乙女 真白)
CV: Yuki Kuwahara

Caring older-sister type-----Kiyoka Jinguji (神宮寺 清香)
CV: Noriko Shibasaki

【Special】
Dynamic Character Expressions System.
Express characters' emotions in greater variety!
Enhance immersion!

【Theme Song】
"Clover Reset"
Music, Lyrics, Arrangement: Shoichiro Toko
Vocals: Saho Shirasuna (as Marin Tachibana)
70010000117609.intro: A yuri novel game that you'll fall in love with at first sight. this is a youthful story of girls wavering between friendship and love.
70010000117609.name: Clover Reset

70050000069229.description:
Choose from an even larger cast of characters in this Nintendo Switch™ 2 Edition Upgrade Pack*, which now adds Rosalina and Co-Star Luma to the existing cast. You can also enable Assist Mode to make any character immune to damage, not just Yoshis and Nabbit! Assist Mode also provides some protection from falls, giving you a Propeller Flower the first time you slip into a pit, lava, or poison swamp. 

Take on all seven of the Koopalings in newly added boss courses scattered throughout the Flower Kingdom, and grab the Super Flower Pot power-up to throw flowers and more.

Meet up with friends for attractions and entertainment in Bellabel Park

Captain Toad has discovered Bellabel Park in the Flower Kingdom! Explore this area with your friends in local**, online***, or local wireless** multiplayer in the Nintendo Switch 2 Edition. Visit the attractions to cooperate or compete in courses that use a variety of game mechanics. 

Share the wonder with more friends—even via GameShare

Team up, or race to the finish, with up to 11 friends online*** or up to seven via newly added local wireless**. You can also play the Nintendo Switch 2 Edition of this game with friends who don’t have it, in person or online, via GameShare****.

Tap amiibo accessories for in-game extras

In the Nintendo Switch 2 Edition, you can now get power-ups in certain courses by tapping amiibo™ accessories*****, including three new ones: Elephant Mario, Poplin & Prince Florian, and Captain Toad & Talking Flower! The game is compatible with any amiibo accessories.
70050000069229.intro: Upgrade the wonder of Mario fun with more content and improvements for the Nintendo Switch™ 2 system
70050000069229.name: Super Mario Bros.™ Wonder – Nintendo Switch™ 2 Edition + Meetup in Bellabel Park Upgrade Pack

70050000070347.description: A brand-new Endless Challenge mode! Enemies will swarm in massive numbers, and you’ll need to keep choosing new spells to build the ultimate magical setup. In fast-paced battles, find the spell strategy that keeps you alive!
70050000070347.name: Spell Panic

70010000104078.description:
The Mega Man Star Force series, which expanded into an anime, is back in the Mega Man Star Force Legacy Collection! This collection includes seven games and additional features like a gallery of illustrations and music! Online play is also supported!

The following titles are included in the collection:

Mega Man Star Force Pegasus
Mega Man Star Force Leo
Mega Man Star Force Dragon
Mega Man Star Force 2 Zerker x Ninja
Mega Man Star Force 2 Zerker x Saurian
Mega Man Star Force 3 Black Ace
Mega Man Star Force 3 Red Joker

It is the year 220X, and the world has seen rapid advancements in Wave technology. Our protagonist, 11-year-old Geo Stelar, refuses to go to school as he mourns the disappearance of his astronaut father.
One night, Geo is at the observatory gazing at stars as he usually does. Suddenly, his Transer picks up a signal from space and he is hit with a powerful electric shock!
When he finally comes to, an alien with an electromagnetic wave body called Omega-Xis is standing over him...

Note: The toy link features found in the original versions are not supported.
70010000104078.intro: The Star Force games make a stellar comeback in a new Legacy Collection!
70010000104078.name: Mega Man Star Force Legacy Collection

70050000064762.description:
This product includes content for the Home screen of the game. Geo Stelar (casual outfit) and Omega-Xis will be added as selectable characters.

Note: Additional character models cannot be used in gameplay.

Special arrangements for four music tracks are also included for the Music Player.

Loneliness – Summer Shade Version
Astro Wave – Brilliant Expanse Version
Anthem of the Solitary – Howling Void Version
Cheerful Indoors – School Days Version
70050000064762.name: Mega Man Star Force Legacy Collection – Geo Stelar and Omega-Xis Character Model Pack

70010000105075.description:
About Homura: The Crimson Warriors
Fourteen years have passed since the Battle of Sekigahara split Japan in two.

Now firmly in control, the Tokugawa shogunate is scheming to eliminate the Toyotomi clan, a long-standing thorn in its side.

In response, the Toyotomi clan has decided to confront the Tokugawa head-on, using Osaka Castle as their stronghold. Calls for support were sent to daimyo throughout the nation and a mere few answered the call. One of these brave warriors was Nobushige Sanada, the second son of the Sanada family who was cast away to Mt. Kudo on house arrest after the Battle of Sekigahara.

Alongside Nobushige on his escape from Mt. Kudo are the Sanada Ten Braves, ten ninjas who serve him even after their exile. Standing in their way are the Ura Yagyu, a group comprised of assassins who have carried out many killings under orders from the shogunate, mysterious swordsmen, and mighty warriors.

This is the final chapter of the Warring States period. It is a tale of the bonds and way of life shared by the Nobushige Sanada and the Ten Braves who gather at Osaka Castle.

Key Features
Amongst the fire and ashes, love will prevail — Previously released in Japan on PS Vita in 2018, Western fans can experience the historical fantasy otome as the protagonist Mutsumi Mochizuki fights alongside the Crimson Warriors. Accompanied with multiple endings and CGs, this legendary battle of love tangled with iconic historical events and original characters in the Warring States period is sure to capture the hearts of history otome lovers!

Maintain peak performance with Energy Reading — Use Energy Reading to detect the affection level and Ring status of love interests. Mutsumi has the special ability to adjust the love interests' Rings. When sped up, it allows them to utilize unique powers at the cost of their physical health. Make sure to keep their Rings balanced! If their health deteriorates too much, the consequences could be dire…

Ninja Guidance — Use your ninja scrolls to keep track of where you are in the story and revisit moments of the past if you seek a different outcome of the path you've chosen. Adjust both your affection and ring levels with each warrior when you select previously viewed events to change the course of history!

Path of the Samurai — Throughout the story, you can level up your ninja rank to keep up with the Crimson Warriors during battle. Take your ninja skills to the next level and make it your mission to reach Master rank and ensure victory against the Ura Yagyu!
70010000105075.intro: Ignite the fire within the Crimson Warriors' hearts in their final showdown!
70010000105075.name: Homura: The Crimson Warriors

70010000105076.description: The Digital Short Stories include five stories—one for each love interest. In 20 pages, find out what happens outside of the battlefield and how fiery things can get!
70010000105076.intro: Ignite the fire within the Crimson Warriors' hearts in their
70010000105076.name: Homura: The Crimson Warriors Digital Short Stories

70010000105077.description:
Sometimes, you need a break from the battlefield (and romance). Grab the Digital Soundtrack to help soothe your soul and tug at your heartstrings!

Tracklist (26 Tracks):
Composition: Yuki Sugiura (STUDIO EDEN INC.)

1. Turmoil
2. Daylight
3. Sunlight Dancing Through Trees
4. Secret Meeting
5. Twilight
6. Flirtation
7. Heartstrings

20. A Dream Within a Dream
21. Eternity
22. Intertwined Fates
23. Parting
24. Soul
25. Full Moon
26. True Love
70010000105077.intro: Ignite the fire within the Crimson Warriors' hearts in their final showdown!
70010000105077.name: Homura: The Crimson Warriors Digital Soundtrack

70050000065184.description: LEGACY SUSPECT PACK – Includes 12 new tokens featuring additional suspects
70050000065184.name: Clue: Legacy Suspect Pack

70070000033943.description:
Brave the Ura Yagyu and win the hearts of the Crimson Warriors with the Deluxe Edition! This bundle includes the digital game, five short stories featuring fiery romance for each of the five love interests, and a 26-track digital soundtrack!

The Deluxe Edition includes:
・Digital Standard Edition
・Digital Short Stories (20 Pages)
・Digital Soundtrack (26 Tracks)
70070000033943.intro: Ignite the fire within the Crimson Warriors' hearts in their final showdown!
70070000033943.name: Homura: The Crimson Warriors Deluxe Edition

70010000117910.description: Move the Nintendo Switch™ to guide balls through handcrafted mazes.
70010000117910.intro: Move the Nintendo Switch™ to guide balls through handcrafted mazes.
70010000117910.name: Game With Balls

70010000105657.description:
Our planet is under attack from the Star Spores, and they've warped life on Earth into ferocious uber-bugs.

Even worse, a nasty alien has made its new home directly attached to your head.

But it's not all bad news - your new best friend has provided both the strength to fight back against the mutated horde, and control over a weapon that can tip the balance of the battle in humanity's favor: the ChainStaff.

As you traverse the surreal landscape, you'll encounter your fellow soldiers, stranded in harsh environments. Do you rescue your comrades or listen to the alien voice in your head and harvest them for upgrades?

If you can persevere and defeat the Star Spores, perhaps you can save everyone…including yourself."
GAME FEATURES
MASTER THE CHAINSTAFF
Hurl it as a spear and slice aliens in half. Throw it to the ground as a shield to stop incoming attacks. Grapple and swing on just about anything. The transforming ChainStaff does all this and more, and all with one button, it’s all up to you.
YOU DIED
Pounded to mush, stabbed through the heart, sheared in two. Prepare to meet your doom in a myriad of disgusting ways. All deaths are avoidable, but some dangers may require special strategies.
FEROCIOUS FOES
The creatures of Earth have been mutated by aliens: you’ll come across dozens of unusual creatures, and once you get past those, you’ll have to fight against screen-filling monstrosities.
GROTESQUE UPGRADES
Stranded soldiers dot the landscape of ChainStaff. You must choose whether to rescue them or devour their organs; each option has unique benefits and will lead to different endings.
10 WILD LEVELS
"Mist trails through rocky crags.
Wind blows over icy, moon-lit hills.
Water streams down mossy cliffs.
Fully hand-drawn art immerses you in a living world inspired by album covers of the 70s and 80s."
KILLER SOUNDTRACK
"Scorching riffs and peals of thunder. Pumping beats drive you ever forward.
Rock out to the classic metal soundtrack by the award-winning composer Deon van Heerden of Broforce and Warhammer 40k: Shootas Blood & Teef soundtrack fame. There’s some lighter interludes with 70s synth, catchy melodies, and even some cowbell. Now it’s back to the heavy tracks, where it’s time to bang your head while smashing skulls.

All depictions of violence are 2 dimensional and heavily stylized. As part of your quest to cleanse Earth of the Star Spore menace, you'll use all the weapons at your disposal to defeat your foes, many of whom will die bloody deaths. Additionally, you may harvest resources from your fellow soldiers in order to increase the power of the alien keeping you alive, and this process is messy.
70010000105657.intro: ChainStaff is a brutal action-platformer with a transforming spear and grappling hook, blazing weapon upgrades, and a rocking soundtrack.
70010000105657.name: ChainStaff

70010000110454.description:
Immerse yourself in the chilling tale of the Chen Family Village, where a mother searching for her missing daughter accidentally stumbles into a haunted place filled with mysterious cults. Guide Jia Jun Lee as she searches a village and pieces together fragile clues to her loved one’s whereabouts, carefully hiding her movements as supernatural threats close in from all sides.

Incantation is a first-person horror-themed adventure game adapted from the live action film of the same name. Beyond the palpable madness and fear in the village, there's a sinister force that drives one to despair. What happens when one crosses the forbidden line of this evil deity?

Perform rituals, solve puzzles, collect documents and hunt for key items to access new areas of the village, all in hopes of finding your missing daughter and escaping alive!

• Explore a remote village that harbors evil secrets and worships malicious spirits!
• Search for clues to your missing daughter’s whereabouts while evading your pursuers.
• Unravel an eerie ritual and discover its deep secrets!
• Solve environmental puzzles and collect key items to gain access to new areas.
• Enjoy an immersive cinematic experience inspired by Taiwanese culture and traditions!
70010000110454.intro: Brave the darkness of a haunted village in hopes of finding a lost loved one!
70010000110454.name: Incantation

70010000111322.description:
Brave Rounds is a fast-paced, close range-heavy vertical scrolling shoot 'em up with the beauty and ruthless precision of 00s arcade classics. Shoot them up by yourself or co-op together with a friend!

Master the art of getting closer and beat the heck out of them!

Play as one of three playable characters accompanied with their Options. Shoot the wide shot, focus shot, deploy the bombs, or unleash their special!

You don't have to fight alone; get a friend and play together in Two Player where they control the Options directly! Or control both characters at once with just one controller with Dual Control!

Brave Rounds tells a touching story of inter-generational relationships and the lengths people take to accomplish their goals. Set in the occult and sci-fi-laden modern era of 20XX, Brave Rounds explores the worth in fighting for what you believe in.

Features:
- Arcade Mode, the game's main mode of high-intensity five stages action. Fight the mid-bosses, bosses, and watch out for the dynamic difficulty: Rank! Are you worthy enough to face the True Last Boss...?
- Stage Practice, for your practicing convenience. Whenever you get stuck at Arcade Mode, visit the Stage Practice.
- Story Mode, telling a different story from Arcade Mode, is where you tackle 41 bite-sized stages. Complete the challenges, get the stars, upgrade your strength. Explore the world of Brave Rounds and the motivations behind the characters in lively and animated Visual Novel-style cutscenes!
- Score Attack. Get the high score in the Score Attack-exclusive stage within the 3 minutes time limit! Dare to put the gas on the pedal and raise the rank to its limit?
- Inspired by 00s video games and animes, Brave Rounds features smooth, hi-res hand-drawn art and animations. Colorful and expressive! Watching their movements is key to success.
- Enjoy the soundtrack of various genres by Dicky Teja Pratama, Jasson Prestiliano and Scowsh!
- Screen scaling options including TATE / Vertical mode, rebindable conrols, and replays!
70010000111322.intro: Shoot, punch and get closer through bullets and enemies in this close range-heavy arcade bullet hell shoot 'em up!
70010000111322.name: Brave Rounds

70070000033942.description:
Two wars. Two battlefields. One test of survival and skill.

This two intense shooter experiences that throw you into unforgiving combat scenarios where every decision matters. Face relentless zombie hordes in a collapsing city and step onto the front lines of World War II, where courage, precision, and tactics decide victory. Whether you’re fighting for survival or honor, this bundle delivers nonstop action across two distinct combat worlds.

DeadZone: Survival Ops Zombie Shooter

The city has fallen. The undead rule. Survival is your only mission.
In DeadZone: Survival Ops Zombie Shooter, you fight through a post-apocalyptic city overrun by zombies. Fast-paced firefights, constant pressure, and limited resources force you to stay alert at all times. Defeat enemies to earn Survival Points, unlock powerful upgrades, and customize your weapons to match your playstyle.

Move between dangerous zones using helicopters, explore abandoned areas filled with hidden threats, and rely on tactical tools like grenades and traps to survive increasingly difficult encounters. Every wave pushes your reflexes and decision-making to the limit.

Key Highlights:

- Intense arcade-style FPS zombie combat
- Weapon and ability upgrades through progression
- Tactical gadgets and customizable equipment
- Survival-focused gameplay in hostile environments

WW2 Soldiers of Honor – Warzone Assault

Honor is forged in the heat of battle.
Step into the chaos of World War II and take on high-risk missions behind enemy lines. As a skilled soldier, you’ll sabotage enemy positions, clear fortified locations, and fight across war-torn environments inspired by historic conflicts.

Each mission challenges your tactical approach, requiring careful weapon choice, positioning, and awareness. Hidden objectives and relics reward exploration, while escalating battles keep the pressure high from start to finish.

Key Highlights:

- Story-driven WWII combat missions
- Historically inspired weapons and gear
- Tactical objectives and strategic gameplay
- Varied war zones with dynamic encounters


From surviving an undead apocalypse to fighting for victory on the battlefield, this bundle offers action, intensity, and replayability across two unique shooters. Master both worlds, adapt to different combat styles, and prove you have what it takes to survive any war.
70070000033942.intro: Survival Has Many Faces. Face Them All.
70070000033942.name: DeadZone: Survival Ops Zombie Shooter & WW2 Soldiers of Honor - Warzone Assault

70010000116663.description:
Create Mii™ characters based on family, friends, or your own original ideas—there are plenty of personality traits, little quirks, and physical traits to choose from—including some face customization options you haven’t seen before! Go deep into getting every detail just right, or create Miis quickly and easily by answering some simple questions, and then help them explore their likes and dislikes, find relationships, and get up to all sorts of fun. Your Miis are bound to surprise you as they take on a life of their own!

Become the caretaker of an island full of silliness, drama, love, and other surprises

Populate your island with Miis and then pick them up and place them near each other to chat and hang out. Watch your Miis forge unlikely friendships, get into fights, fall in (and out of) love unexpectedly, and so much more as they live their lives! 

Get to know what your Mii characters like as you take care of them. Give them clothes, food, items, and—most importantly—life advice as they deal with all kinds of problems and situations. You’ll also naturally help shape the community as Miis may pick up and start using the words and phrases you teach them.

Build, decorate, and give gifts to make your Miis happy

Shape your landscape! Design your island and place homes, stores, restaurants, and more to supply events and entertainment for your community. Decorate your Mii characters' homes by gifting them furniture, wallpaper, floors, custom-designed interior and exterior decorations, and more—and create pets, food, clothing, and items like books and video games to suit each Mii!
70010000116663.intro: Populate your island with Mii characters—and find out what happens when they all live there together!
70010000116663.name: Tomodachi Life™: Living the Dream

70010000098098.description:
Love food truck cooking games? Get ready to unleash your inner chef with Food Truck Chef! Join Emily on a global culinary journey, preparing mouthwatering recipes from tacos and sushi to pizza and beyond!
 
Food Truck Chef is an exciting, fast-paced cooking and management game where your culinary dreams come to life on wheels! Start with a humble food truck where you'll prepare meals, satisfy customers, and work your way up to transform it into the ultimate foodie hotspot! 
 
Master the kitchen
Upgrade your food truck, serve hungry customers, and become a top chef! Time management is key as you cook, serve, and manage your way to success.
 
Explore the world
Discover 19+ exciting locations, each with unique dishes to master. From the bustling food streets of Asia to the vibrant flavors of Mexico, there's always a new kitchen challenge to tackle.
 
Key features
• Endless fun: Hundreds of levels, dishes, and upgrades to keep you entertained.
• Addictive gameplay: Easy to learn, with fast-paced cooking game mechanics.
• Colorful visuals: Enjoy lively, engaging art that brings each food truck scene to life.
70010000098098.intro: Manage and build your Food Truck! Cook global dishes, upgrade your kitchen, and serve hungry customers in this fast-paced cooking game
70010000098098.name: Food Truck Chef - Full Course Edition

70010000103743.description:
An all-new title from Demon Artist Kazuma Kaneko, the visionary mind behind a legacy of groundbreaking games.

Tokyo, 20XX. The colossal bay area megastructure, "THE HASHIRA," has been severed from the outside world. You are a "Tsukuyomi," an elite agent of a national defense organization. Your mission: Infiltrate the isolation zone, battle through a tower overrun by eldritch "Jinma," and ascend to the summit to uncover the terrifying truth.
20XX

Razor-Sharp Strategy: "Jinma Card" Battles
Engage in intense turn-based card combat where every decision carries weight. With a strict hand limit of just three cards, you must carefully manage your resources. Read the enemy’s telegraphed attacks and choose your path: use your "Jinma Cards" to strike, or hold them in hand to bolster your defenses? Every successful battle grants you a choice of a new Jinma card to add to your current deck, opening up endless strategic deck building possibilities. Experience a battle system that is streamlined, fast-paced, and deceptively deep.

A Gripping Story Where Myth and Reality Collide
A multi-perspective saga of four "Tsukuyomi" agents, each walking a divergent path. Switch between characters to experience their conflicting convictions and personal battles. Only by reaching the summit will you uncover the colossal truth hidden within THE HASHIRA.

Forge a Unique Arsenal Through Every Decision
Your decisions during exploration directly shape the properties of special "Creation Cards" that are earned and added to your deck over the course of your exploration. Even if you fall in battle, these cards are not lost to the void. Instead, you retain the chance to reclaim them in future runs. Through repeated cycles of death and rebirth, your deck expands and evolves, allowing you to craft a build that is uniquely yours.
70010000103743.intro: Ancient myths awaken in a modern-day Babel. A tactical deck-building tower dungeon RPG from the legendary Demon Artist, Kazuma Kaneko.
70010000103743.name: KAZUMA KANEKO'S TSUKUYOMI

70050000069095.description:
This add-on content grants access to special "Creation Cards" for use in-game.

“Pack Contents”
- Shiva
- Hathor
- Nephthys
- Orcus
- Khonsu

Note: Also included in a bundle. Please avoid duplicate purchases. Content available immediately in-game.
70050000069095.name: KAZUMA KANEKO: Refined Arts Pack vol.1

70070000033462.description:
"The Digital Deluxe Edition is a bundle that includes the base game and additional content. A Standard Edition containing only the base game is also available. Please take care not to make duplicate purchases.

""Bundle Contents""
- KAZUMA KANEKO'S TSUKUYOMI(Base Game)
- DLC KAZUMA KANEKO: Refined Arts Pack vol.1"
70070000033462.intro: Ancient myths awaken in a modern-day Babel. A sleek, tactical deck-building tower dungeon from the legendary Demon Artist, Kazuma Kaneko.
70070000033462.name: KAZUMA KANEKO'S TSUKUYOMI Digital Deluxe Edition

70050000056420.description: Adds Character 3 to the roster of playable characters.
70050000056420.name: Additional Character 3

70010000103435.description:
Winx Club: The Magic is Back captures the essence of the Winx universe, delivering an enchanting experience with a mix of magical combat, puzzle-solving, and cooperative gameplay with a friend. Play as all six members of the Winx Club, each with their own magical abilities.

KEY FEATURES
 
Play as Your Favorite Fairies
Play as all six members of the Winx Club, tailoring your experience based on your preferred character and their abilities. Freely switch between all five of the Winx while playing.

Explore Iconic Settings from the Winx Universe
Attend Alfea College and journey to familiar and distinct Winx locations, including The Enchanted Forest, The Coastal Cliffs, and The Desert Ruins of Red Fountain.

Winx Action in Your Hands
Engage in combat against fantasy creatures, where you’ll use each character’s unique magical abilities to bring peace to the lands. Upgrade spells to strengthen your fairies for even more fun.

Play with a Friend
With two-player local co-op, you and a friend can enjoy Winx Club together!
70010000103435.intro: Play as your favorite Winx in this brand new adventure.
70010000103435.name: Winx Club: The Magic is Back

70050000051004.description: Ticket to Ride: Winter includes a Board, 2 characters, 2 locomotives and 2 carriages.
70050000051004.name: Ticket to Ride®: Poland Expansion

70050000060109.description:
New warriors from the Dragon Ball DAIMA anime series join the battle!

- 8 Playable Characters:
• Goku (Mini), Super Saiyan
• Vegeta (Mini)
• Vegeta (Mini), Super Saiyan
• Vegeta (Mini), Super Saiyan 2
• Vegeta (Mini), Super Saiyan 3
• Glorio
• Panzy
• Majin Kuu

‐ Goku (Mini) Technique-changing Outfit
• New costume for Goku (Mini) that changes his moves

Get the Dragon Ball DAIMA: Character Pack 1 and enjoy new battles!

*Goku (Mini) Technique-changing Outfit is different from Pre-Order Pack Goku (Mini).
*Ownership of Pre-Order Pack Goku (Mini) is not required.
*Equipping the Goku (Mini) Technique-changing Outfit costume on Goku (Mini) will not alter his appearance.
*Equipping the Goku (Mini) Technique-changing Outfit costume on Goku (Mini) will transform his Ultimate Blast into Aura Impact.
70050000060109.name: DRAGON BALL: Sparking! ZERO - Dragon Ball DAIMA: Character Pack 1

70050000060111.description: Contains playable characters from DRAGON BALL DAIMA.
70050000060111.name: DRAGON BALL: Sparking! ZERO DLC 3

70050000060113.description:
Shallot from the mobile game DRAGON BALL LEGENDS joins the battle!

1 Playable character:
- Shallot

Enjoy new battles with the main character of DRAGON BALL LEGENDS, designed by Akira Toriyama!
70050000060113.name: DRAGON BALL: Sparking! ZERO - Shallot (DRAGON BALL LEGENDS)

70010000094826.description:
Learn a dozen abilities, each more amazing than the last!
■ STICKY HONEY - Spread honey on your face to stick to objects and climb walls
■ POWERFUL CHOCOLATE - Use hardened chocolate to break obstacles

A piece of cake?!
■ VACATIONS GONE WRONG - Welcome to the Jam Session Cruise! Lucky you, you just happened to stumble across a ticket for a lovely vacation at sea! At least, until you discover that this boat can barely float!
■ DELICIOUSLY SWEET LEVELS - Explore dozens of levels and find huge candies to fuel the boat. From fruity cakes to tropical jungles to haunted floating islands (and more!), get bready for some tasty sights!
■ FRIENDLY TOASTS EVERYWHERE - You're not alone on this cruise; lots of other toasts are along for the ride! Get to know them: they’ve all got a good reason for being there. Maybe you can help them?
■ NEO-RETRO GAMEPLAY - Got a taste for platformers? Discover this toast's original moveset: slap, aerial dash, French toast (absorb and spit out liquid!!)... No spoilers, we'll stop the list here...
■ TONS OF COLLECTIBLES - Like collecting lots of shiny little things? You’re going to loaf it! Reach for the stars with 100% completion!!!
■ CHALLENGES FOR THE BRAVE - Want to give yourself a slice of hard mode? This cruise has some nice surprises in store! But don't panic, all these challenges are optional.
70010000094826.intro: Pardon My French Toast is a 3D platformer starring a slice of toast who covers himself in sweet spreads to get fun abilities.
70010000094826.name: Pardon My French Toast

70050000045574.description: Clue - Neon Noir includes a Location, 6 Suspects, 4 Customisation Items, and 6 Tokens to unlock!
70050000045574.name: Clue - Neon Noir

70050000056421.description: Adds Character 4 to the roster of playable characters.
70050000056421.name: Additional Character 4

70050000046329.description: The Painted Red Crime Scene includes a Location, 6 Suspects, 4 Customisation Items, and 6 Tokens to unlock!
70050000046329.name: Clue - Painted Red

70050000060827.description:
Delve deeper into the eerie lands of The Spiral. 

This additional tale enriches the experience and lets you uncover hidden secrets, new perspectives, and unexpected horrors.
70050000060827.name: Little Nightmares III - First Additional Chapter

70010000110953.description:
Digimon Story Time Stranger is an RPG with monster-taming elements that explores the deep bond between humans and Digimon in an epic story that unravels the mystery of the world’s collapse.

Embark on an adventure that spans across the human world and Digital World, collecting and raising a diverse array of Digimon to fight in turn-based battles.

An Epic Story of Connection
Tokyo, Japan – An agent of a secret organization encounters an unknown creature shortly before a city-leveling explosion. They then reawaken eight years in the past...
Take on a mission to uncover the mystery of the world’s collapse, where chance encounters with unique characters will shape your journey across time and parallel worlds - and change fate itself.

Adventure Between Worlds and Time
Journey between the parallel human world and the Digital World: Iliad where Digimon reside. Explore the Digital World and its intricately detailed realms and discover all of its secrets.

Strategic Turn-Based Battles
Enjoy dynamic turn-based combat that combines strategic elements with evolved battle components. More than 450 Digimon and deep customization options provide limitless ways to approach the challenges of battle and reveal the strength of the bonds formed with your Digimon.

*This product is the Standard Edition. A Deluxe Edition and Ultimate Edition are also available. Please be careful of duplicate purchases.
70010000110953.name: Digimon Story Time Stranger

70010000070278.description:
The extreme tension of infiltrating without being detected.
Metal Gear series, the pinnacle of “stealth action” Immerse yourself in the Metal Gear series, the pinnacle of “stealth action” where you can infiltrate and elude your enemies to complete missions.

The game takes place five years after the Big Shell incident in METAL GEAR SOLID 2: Sons of Liberty, in a world where war has become a business.
To stop Liquid Ocelot's uprising, Solid Snake throws himself into his final battle.
The battle against Liquid and the Patriots draws to a close, and the mysteries woven throughout the series are now revealed!

【STORY】
THE TRANSFORMATION OF WAR INTO BUSINESS.
In an era where PMCs (private military companies) have risen to the top, war has become a business and the driving force behind the world economy. 

Controlling the top five PMCs from behind the scenes is Liquid Ocelot, who fanning the flames of war even further, plans an insurrection with the goal of creating a world where warriors can lead fulfilling lives—a goal shared by none other than Big Boss. 

Under the theme of “Sense” watch as the final battle of the man with Big Boss’s genes, Solid Snake, unfolds.

----------
The Screenplay Book containing in-game text from Metal Gear Solid 4: Guns of the Patriots and the Master Book detailing the story and characters are also included within the game.

[Game]
Metal Gear Solid 4: Guns of the Patriots
*Versions for other regions can be downloaded separately from the store.

[Digital Contents]
Metal Gear Solid 4 Database
Metal Gear Solid 4: Screenplay Book
Metal Gear Solid 4: Master Book
*Accessible via the in-game Start Menu.

----------
【METAL GEAR SOLID: MASTER COLLECTION Vol.1 Save-Data Bonus】
If you have save data from titles included in METAL GEAR SOLID MASTER COLLECTION Vol.1, you can receive in-game items usable in the game as a bonus.

・Metal Gear Solid 4: Guns of the Patriots Bonus: Gold Camouflage

*Bonus content can be obtained by playing this game respectively.
*This requires that save data for titles included in METAL GEAR SOLID: MASTER COLLECTION Vol.1, created using the same account, be present on the console used to play this game.
*Playing this game first, then starting to play titles included in METAL GEAR SOLID: MASTER COLLECTION Vol.1, still qualifies you for this bonus.
70010000070278.name: METAL GEAR SOLID 4: Guns of the Patriots - Master Collection Version

70010000070283.description:
The extreme tension of infiltrating without being detected.
Metal Gear series, the pinnacle of “stealth action” where you avoid combat and complete missions while hiding.

The game take place 10 years after METAL GEAR SOLID 3: Snake Eater.
Amidst the swirling conspiracies behind the East-West Cold War, Snake confronts them while leading a private military force.
This is the story of how one soldier, “Snake”, becomes “Big Boss”.

【STORY】
THE ILLUSION OF PEACE FALTERS

In 1964, after saving the world from all-out nuclear war, Naked Snake, a true hero, receives the name Big Boss, but he disappears shortly after the naming ceremony.

Ten years later, Big Boss is running an independent military unit in Columbia, when he is visited by two individuals from Costa Rica, a country without a military.

In a post-Cuban Missile Crisis world, and in a Central America essential to maintaining the power balance between East and West, Costa Rica has been miraculously able to maintain peace.
However, a mysterious armed group has been seen acting suspiciously throughout the region.

They request Big Boss to investigate and eliminate the armed group.
Though he hesitates to accept the request because the tape they brought contained the voice of The Boss, who was supposed to be dead.

【System】
This title offers not only thrilling solo infiltration missions but also co-op with “SENYU” via online connections, and competitive multiplayer for up to six players.

The offshore facility Mother Base supports your missions.

It houses staff living quarters, development labs for mission weapons and gear, storage for captured large-scale weapons, and more. Expanding your staff allows Mother Base to grow and develop, incorporating simulation elements.

----------
The Screenplay Book containing in-game text from Metal Gear Solid: Peace Walker and the Master Book detailing the story and characters are also included within the game.

70070000033533.description:
The extreme tension of infiltrating without being detected.
Metal Gear series, the pinnacle of “stealth action” Immerse yourself in the Metal Gear series, the pinnacle of “stealth action” where you can infiltrate and elude your enemies to complete missions.
This collection is the second installment of the definitive Metal Gear Master Collection.

Vol. 2 includes Metal Gear Solid 4: Guns of the Patriots and Metal Gear Solid: Peace Walker (HD Collection version).

Each game includes a Screenplay Book containing the text from the respective title, plus a Master Book offering detailed insights into the story and characters.

Also, as purchase bonuses for the collection edition, it includes METAL GEAR Ghost Babel—the series first title for handheld consoles, released in 2000—and Metal Gear Solid: Digital Soundtrack Vol.2, featuring numerous iconic tracks that enhanced Snake's missions, ranging from BGM used in the games to vocal songs.

[Game List]
Metal Gear Solid 4: Guns of the Patriots
Metal Gear Solid: Peace Walker (HD Collection version)
Metal Gear: Ghost Babel
*Versions for other regions of Metal Gear Solid 4: Guns of the Patriots can be downloaded separately from the store.
*Metal Gear Solid: Peace Walker (HD Collection version) supports online play for up to 6 players.

[Digital contents]
METAL GEAR SOLID 4 Database
Metal Gear Solid 4: Screenplay Book
Metal Gear Solid 4: Master Book
Metal Gear Solid: Peace Walker Screenplay Book
Metal Gear Solid: Peace Walker Master Book
Metal Gear Solid: Digital Soundtrack Vol.2
*Accessible via the in-game Start Menu.
*The soundtrack can be enjoyed using the dedicated sound player included within the game.

【METAL GEAR SOLID: MASTER COLLECTION Vol.1 Save-data bonus 】
If you have save data for any title included in METAL GEAR SOLID: MASTER COLLECTION Vol.1, you can receive in-game items usable in Metal Gear Solid 4: Guns of the Patriots and Metal Gear Solid: Peace Walker (HD Collection version) respectively.

・Metal Gear Solid 4: Guns of the Patriots Bonus: Gold Camouflage
・Metal Gear Solid: Peace Walker (HD Collection version) Bonus: Uniform: GOLD

*Bonus content can be obtained by playing Metal Gear Solid 4: Guns of the Patriots and Metal Gear Solid: Peace Walker (HD Collection version) respectively.
*This requires that save data for titles included in METAL GEAR SOLID: MASTER COLLECTION Vol.1, created using the same account, be present on the console used to play Metal Gear Solid 4: Guns of the Patriots and Metal Gear Solid: Peace Walker (HD Collection version).
*Playing Metal Gear Solid 4: Guns of the Patriots and Metal Gear Solid: Peace Walker (HD Collection version) first, then starting to play titles included in METAL GEAR SOLID: MASTER COLLECTION Vol.1, still qualifies you for this bonus.
